page.title: 09PUBLIC TRANSPORT :PEBMARSH
page.content: The{Countrycar,}run by Eastern National, takes people to{Sudbury}on{ {Thursdays.}On{Tuesdays}and{Fridays}it goes to{Halstead.}These are Market Days. The Countrycar can carry up to six passengers and the return fare to either Sudbury or Halstead is{Â£1.05.} The car used is a Peugot Estate. The{Countrybus,}run by Hedingham Omnibus Co.Ltd.,starts from Hedingham and picks up passengers at Pebmarsh on the way to{Braintree}on{Wednesdays}at 10.05 a.m.It arrives at Braintree at 10.50 a.m.The return fare is 90p.This is cheaper than the Countrycar although Braintree is farther away than Sudbury or Halstead. There are no other Public Transport Services through the area,although school transport to Pebmarsh School and Hedingham School covers our area.
